column3:
Once upon a time there were three rabbits, named Winston, Chester, and Francis. Chester
ewlinewas a brown rabbit with large eyes. Francis was grey and white and had messy fur. Winston
ewlinewas black and very fat. They were very happy rabbits who loved to eat. Every day they
ewlinewould leave their home, cross a road, and go through a small forest to get to a meadow of
ewlinegrass. They loved to eat that grass. One day, Chester thought he smelled something
ewlineinteresting. At first he thought it might be dirt. Then he thought maybe some sort of
ewlineflower. So, he asked a nearby squirrel. The squirrel's name was Acorn. Acorn said that he
ewlinethought it was mushrooms. However, Francis, the smartest rabbit, went to go look, and he
ewlinelearned that it was actually a garden of carrots. The rabbits were all excited. They all
ewlineloved carrots! They ate all the carrots.
column4: multiple: What was the interesting smell?
column19: multiple: Where did the rabbits go to eat everyday?
